metadata.synopsis: The grieving tiefling pair at the gate face off with Sazza. Arka is set on killing Sazza as indirect revenge for the death of Kanon, who was slain by goblins.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. loadlevel Wild_Main_A2. Goto 209, 429 to trigger Plea At The Gates3. Skip through dialogue4. Killcombat to finish the combat5. Find Kanon's body on top of the gate6. Talk to Arka or Memnos, who are standing over him and skip through7.Arka (and Memnos if alive) will goto Sazza's cage at 186, 598, wait for them to arrive.8. Walk over to cage.

6.speaker: Memnos
6.text: Arka, wait! You can't just shoot her!
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: CUSTOM SCENE VIEWER: Sazza in cageNodeContext: mocking. Sazza is mocking Arka. Arka's hands ARE shaking and so is the crossbow.

100.speaker: Arka
100.text: Why not? That's what her kind did to Kanon.

11.speaker: Sazza
11.text: Ya ain't gonna shoot me. Yer hands are shakin'.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: CUSTOM SCENE VIEWER: Sazza in cageNodeContext: mocking. Sazza is mocking Arka. Arka's hands ARE shaking and so is the crossbow.

49.speaker: Sazza
49.text: Ya ain't gonna shoot me. Yer hands are shakin'.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: CUSTOM SCENE VIEWER: Sazza in cageNodeContext: mocking. Sazza is mocking Arka. Arka's hands ARE shaking and so is the crossbow.

64.speaker: Memnos
64.text: Put it down. She can't fight back.

70.speaker: Arka
70.text: That's the point. Get out of the way.

41.speaker: Memnos
41.text: She didn't kill your brother, Arka. You're better than this.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: SCRIPT: Stepping otu of the way. NodeContext: Sadly

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *Your mind wanders: If the crossbow bolt shot through her mouth, would she taste the metal before she died?*

28.speaker: Sazza
28.text: Shoot before you lose your nerve, tiefling. If you ever had it to begin with.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Shut up. Those words could be your last.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Aiming crossbow.NodeContext: grim and snappy

74.speaker: Sazza
74.text: I'm not afraid. Chosen by the Absolute, I am. I'm blessed.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Aiming crossbow.NodeContext: grim and snappy

93.speaker: Arka
93.text: Oh, I'll bless you all right.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Aiming crossbow.NodeContext: grim and snappy

68.speaker: Player
68.text: Move in front of the tiefling's crossbow.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: SCRIPT: Player steps into the path of the shot, protecting Sazza.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: Step between the crossbow and the goblin.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: SCRIPT: Player steps into the path of the shot, protecting Sazza.

23.speaker: Sazza
23.text: Looks like the Absolute sent me a protector. Ya gonna kill them too?
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sazza in cageNodeContext: Laughs

13.speaker: Arka
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: to goblin, then to playerNodeContext: to goblin, then to player

21.speaker: Player
21.text: What would Kanon think of you now?
21.context: NodeContext: The player's convinced her to spare the goblin, but she's lashing out in grief.

22.speaker: Arka
22.context: NodeContext: The player's convinced her to spare the goblin, but she's lashing out in grief.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: Lower the crossbow, or I'll deliver you right to your brother.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: No, shoot me. Should be easy, right?

4.speaker: Arka
4.text: What in every hell is wrong with you?
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astonished horror - this player is crazy!NodeContext: Astonished horror

42.speaker: Arka
42.text: What in every hell is wrong with you?
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astonished horror - this player is crazy!NodeContext: Astonished horror

29.text: You fought for us, so I'll give you one last chance. Move.

44.speaker: Arka
44.text: You fought for us, so I'll give you one last chance. Move.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: This won't avenge Kanon. It won't change anything.

92.speaker: Arka
92.text: You're right. I wish you weren't, I really do.

15.speaker: Arka
15.text: You're right. I wish you weren't, I really do.

69.speaker: Arka
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Beat before speaking, studying the player to see if they're serious. NodeContext: First sentence quiet. Second one loud/.

106.speaker: Player
106.text: I sense the pain you carry - but killing this creature will not ease your burden.

61.speaker: Arka
61.text: Maybe not. But it'll wipe the shit-grin off its face, at least.

43.text: Maybe not. But it'll wipe the shit-grin off its face, at least.

81.speaker: Arka
81.text: Maybe not. But it'll wipe the shit-grin off its face, at least.

102.speaker: Arka
102.text: You want to die for this stupid goblin? Fine.

65.text: You want to die for this stupid goblin? Fine.

107.speaker: Arka
107.text: You want to die for this stupid goblin? Fine.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Killing this goblin won't help you. Let the gods provide comfort.

33.speaker: Arka
33.text: Comfort? Is that what you think I'm after?

30.speaker: Arka
30.text: Comfort? Is that what you think I'm after?

10.speaker: Arka
10.text: Why do you care if a goblin lives or dies?

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Because she's not a practice target. She's a person.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Comforting Arka. NodeContext: Softly, comforting

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Tsk. Your soft heart will be the death of us.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Comforting Arka. NodeContext: Softly, comforting

82.speaker: Lae'zel
82.text: Tsk. Your soft heart will be the death of us.
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Comforting Arka. NodeContext: Softly, comforting

55.speaker: Player
55.text: Can't say I understand that. Not sure I want to.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Comforting Arka. NodeContext: Softly, comforting

24.speaker: Arka
24.text: Can't say I understand that. Not sure I want to.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Comforting Arka. NodeContext: Softly, comforting

19.speaker: Memnos
19.text: It's all right, Arka. Let's go.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Comforting Arka. NodeContext: Softly, comforting

84.speaker: Player
84.text: If she dies, she'll take everything she knows to the grave.
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angrily, then calming herself down.NodeContext: Hotly, then giving up.

8.speaker: Arka
8.text: If you believe anything the beast tells you, you're an idiot.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: A goblin prisoner. Her life isn't yours to take.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angrily, then calming herself down.NodeContext: Hotly, then giving up.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: Not sure I get that. The bars don't make her special. But, fine, whatever.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Not sure I get that. The bars don't make her special. But, fine, whatever.

80.speaker: Arka
80.text: Not sure I get that. The bars don't make her special. But, fine, whatever.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Because vengeance eats people alive. You'll grant the goblins two victories this day.
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angrily, then calming herself down.NodeContext: Hotly, then giving up.

58.speaker: Player
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angrily, then calming herself down.NodeContext: Hotly, then giving up.

62.speaker: Player
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angrily, then calming herself down.NodeContext: Hotly, then giving up.

46.speaker: Arka
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angrily, then calming herself down.NodeContext: Hotly, then giving up.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: She still has a story to tell. One I want to hear.

26.text: I'm not looking for miracles. Just blood.

59.speaker: Arka
59.text: I'm not looking for miracles. Just blood.

16.speaker: Player
16.context: NodeContext: Emotional. She's wrestling with herself over doing this, but she doesn't know what else to do.

91.speaker: Arka
91.text: Kanon would hate me for this. But he's not here. They took him from me.
91.context: NodeContext: Emotional. She's wrestling with herself over doing this, but she doesn't know what else to do.

87.speaker: Arka
87.text: Kanon would hate me for this. But he's not here. They took him from me.
87.context: NodeContext: Emotional. She's wrestling with herself over doing this, but she doesn't know what else to do.

72.text: Ugh... stop it! Get out of my head!

9.speaker: Arka
9.text: Ugh... stop it! Get out of my head!

73.speaker: Player
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: SCRIPT: Step out of way

2.speaker: Arka
2.text: Here it comes, you little beast.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: This- This is wrong, isn't it?
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Arka aiming a crossbow at SazzaNodeContext: Addressing the player

94.speaker: Arka
94.text: I didn't ask for you to say a damn thing - keep out of it!
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Arka aiming a crossbow at SazzaNodeContext: Addressing the player

86.speaker: Player
86.text: This goblin is in need of judgement. I should decide her fate.

3.speaker: Sazza
3.text: Doesn't even matter if ya kill me. I'm chosen by the Absolute, I am. I'm blessed.
